title: Vionheart Content (DOTA)
description: Fan-made DOTA content for the Vionheart campaign.

creep.label: Creep
creep.description: This creature is a manifestation from an Ancient.

hero.label: Hero
hero.description: This spell is an ability of a chosen from an Ancient.

magic-recovery.label: Magic Recovery
magic-recovery.description:
This item allow spellcasters to regain their spell slots.
When you recover Magic Points, you regain a spell slot equal to the Magic Points recovered or lower, you can divide the amount as many times as you want to regain multiple, lower ranked spell slots.

strength.label: Strength
strength.description: Affects Strength-based attack rolls and damage, Fortitude saves and maximum Hit Points.

agility.label: Agility
agility.description: Affects Dexterity-based attack rolls and damage, Reflex saves, Attack Speed and Physical Protection.

intelligence.label: Intelligence
intelligence.description: Affects Intelligence-, Wisdom-, Charisma-based attack rolls and damage, Class DCs, Spell attack rolls and DCs, Perception and Magical Protection.

health.label: Health
health.description: This item increases maximum Hit Points.

attack-speed.label: Attack Speed
attack-speed.description: This item grants a circumstance bonus to attack rolls with multiple attack penalty.

attack-damage.label: Attack Damage
attack-damage.description: This item grants additional damage to all Strikes.

lifesteal.label: Lifesteal
lifesteal.description: This item restore your Hit Points via Strikes.

spell-lifesteal.label: Spell Lifesteal
spell-lifesteal.description: This item restore your Hit Points via spells.

physical-protection.label: Physical Protection
physical-protection.description: This item grants a bonus AC and physical damage resistance.

magical-protection.label: Magical Protection
magical-protection.description: This item grants a bonus to AC and saving throws vs. magic and magical damage resistance.

magic-recovery.label: Magic Recovery
magic-recovery.description:
This item allow spellcasters to regain their spell slots.
When you recover Magic Points, you regain a spell slot equal to the Magic Points recovered or lower, you can divide the amount as many times as you want to regain multiple, lower ranked spell slots.
